Package humans

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
humans.Human
humans.Patient
public class Patient extends Human
Represents a patient in the insurance system. Patients have medical records have insurance details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String name, LocalDate dateOfBirth, String nricFin, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, ResidentialStatus residentialStatus, String nationality, String address, Contact contact, Sex sex, BloodType bloodType, boolean isVaccinated, String patientId, List<String> drugAllergies, List<MedicalRecord> medicalRecords, String nokName, String nokAddress, String nokRelation, double height, double weight, String occupation, String companyName, String companyAddress)
      Constructs a Patient object with specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The patient's name.
      dateOfBirth - The patient's date of birth.
      nricFin - The patient's NRIC or FIN number.
      maritalStatus - The patient's marital status.
      residentialStatus - The patient's residential status.
      nationality - The patient's nationality.
      address - The patient's residental address.
      contact - The patient's contact details.
      sex - The patient's sex.
      bloodType - The patient's blood type.
      isVaccinated - Indicates if the patient is vaccinated.
      patientId - The patient's unique ID.
      drugAllergies - A list of the patient's drug allergies.
      medicalRecords - A list of the patient's medical records.
      nokName - The next of kin's name.
      nokAddress - The next of kin's residential address.
      nokRelation - The relationship between the patient and the next of kin.
      height - The patient's height in metres.
      weight - The patient's weight in kilograms.
